00023 CPPUNIT_TEST_SUITE_REGISTRATION( CheckSumTest );

00025 using namespace affymetrix_calvin_utilities;

00035 void CheckSumTest::testmethod_CheckSumTest_even_number_of_points()
00036 {
00037         u_int16_t data1[] = {10, 20, 30, 40};
00038         size_t size = sizeof(data1);
00039         u_int16_t csum = CheckSum::OnesComplementCheckSum(data1, size);
00040         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( csum == 65435 );
00041 
00042         u_int16_t data2[] = {10, 20, 30, 40, 65435};
00043         size = sizeof(data2);
00044         csum = CheckSum::OnesComplementCheckSum(data2, size);
00045         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( csum == 0 );
00046 }
00047 
00048 void CheckSumTest::testmethod_CheckSumTest_odd_number_of_points()
00049 {
00050         u_int16_t data1[] = {10, 20, 30, 40, 50};
00051         size_t size = sizeof(data1);
00052         u_int16_t csum = CheckSum::OnesComplementCheckSum(data1, size);
00053         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( csum == 65385 );
00054 
00055         u_int16_t data2[] = {10, 20, 30, 40, 50, 65385};
00056         size = sizeof(data2);
00057         csum = CheckSum::OnesComplementCheckSum(data2, size);
00058         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( csum == 0 );
00059 }
00060 
00061 void CheckSumTest::testmethod_CheckSumTest_overflow()
00062 {
00063         u_int16_t data1[] = {10000, 20000, 30000, 40000, 50000};
00064         size_t size = sizeof(data1);
00065         u_int16_t csum = CheckSum::OnesComplementCheckSum(data1, size);
00066         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( csum == 46605 );
00067 
00068         u_int16_t data2[] = {10000, 20000, 30000, 40000, 50000, 46605};
00069         size = sizeof(data2);
00070         csum = CheckSum::OnesComplementCheckSum(data2, size);
00071         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( csum == 0 );
00072 }
